attributes.action: call for a fully comprehensive Public Inquiry into the July 7th 2005 London Bombings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the events of July 7th 2005 the media has consistantly reported factually inaccurate information about the movements of the alleged suicide bombers, and the movement of Thameslink trains from Luton

rejection.details:
There is already a very similar petition up:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Bombings/
If you would prefer your own to be launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
